description: This file defines a Qwik component for a Todo List application, including state management, loader and action functions for adding items, and the JSX rendering logic.

classes.name: ListItem
classes.description: Defines the shape of a list item with a text property

methods.name: useListLoader
methods.description: Loader function to retrieve the current list of items

methods.name: useAddToListAction
methods.description: Action function to add a new item to the list, with validation using zod
